Title: Sedition
Plot: Following the Rangers' decision to take justice into their own hands, Major Beck goes to extreme measures to prove he's in complete control of the town, while Hawkins receives a call from Chavez telling him that it's time to transport the bomb.
Writer: Carol Barbee, Stephen Scaia, Matthew Federman
GuestStars: Pamela Reed, David Huddleston, Geno Monterio, Jazz Raycole, Chris Kramer, David Michie, David Meunier, Glenn Davies, Michael Harrity, Mark Engelhardt, Sterling D. Ardrey
